welcome_message_body: Welcome to Shirayamamachi, a charming city known for its picturesque mountains, hot springs, and traditional Japanese culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy the beauty and tranquility of our city.

restaurants.name: キッチン ユキ
restaurants.description: キッチン ユキ is a yoshoku restaurant located in 白山市.

restaurants.name: Morimori Sushi (もりもり寿し 松任店)
restaurants.description: Morimori Sushi (もりもり寿し 松任店) is a sushi restaurant located in 白山市.
restaurants.address: 幸明町256 (アピタ松任店), 白山市, 石川県, 924-0817

restaurants.name: Gyoza Ohsho (餃子の王将 松任店)
restaurants.description: Gyoza Ohsho (餃子の王将 松任店) is a chinese restaurant located in 白山市.

restaurants.name: 軍鶏屋本店
restaurants.description: 軍鶏屋本店 is a japanese restaurant located in 白山市.

restaurants.description: Hachiban Ramen (8番らーめん 松任店) is a ramen restaurant located in 白山市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Komatsu Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'KMT-FreeWiFi' and entering their email address.
